title: Best Buy slashes $200 off the ultra-thin Galaxy Chromebook Plus — matching Black Friday's pricing!
description: Days after Cyber Monday, Best Buy is still carving $200 off the Galaxy Chromebook Plus, one of our favorite Chromebooks on the market.
content: Whether you're doing some holiday shopping or simply upgrading the home office, I just noticed one leftover Cyber Monday Chromebook deal that deserves your immediate attention. Best Buy has decided t… [+2318 chars]
